f7f5ab7651d32ce260d7ba5082d6cf83 (02:39): to share files between linux and windows
b138c9c017413762c8f9537a20705b20 (02:39): but why wouldn't you just run windows
f91e07db3bc353f20751ecdf8e913d94 (02:39): i have samba set up to be a domain controller, but xp complaind about netbios name

f7f5ab7651d32ce260d7ba5082d6cf83 (02:41): id google for a wiki regardign samba
